name: There's a protest in town ...
description:
There's a protest in town ...

and nobody showed up.

We are going to change that!

--------

Find other people and convince them to join the protest.  To convince them, repeat their input tasks and stay in rythm. The bigger the protest gets, the easier is it to convince larger groups of people.

Controls:

WASD | Left stick: move
Arrow keys | Face buttons: input rythm commands
Escape : return to main menu

This game was developed for the Rainbow Jam 2020 by fenchel (@fenchel_) and Marig (@DareLooks)
